T1059.001::[DarkHydrus] leveraged PowerShell to download and execute additional scripts for execution.
T1204.002::[DarkHydrus] has sent malware that required users to hit the enable button in Microsoft Excel to allow an .iqy file to be downloaded.
T1564.003::[DarkHydrus] has used -WindowStyle Hidden to conceal [PowerShell] windows.

T1566.001::[DarkHydrus] has sent spearphishing emails with password-protected RAR archives containing malicious Excel Web Query files (.iqy). The group has also sent spearphishing emails that contained malicious Microsoft Office documents that use the “attachedTemplate” technique to load a template from a remote server.
T1588.002::[DarkHydrus] has obtained and used tools such as [Mimikatz], [Empire], and [Cobalt Strike].
